${ModID}:BreakdancePower.NAME: Breakdance
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn you break #yDance, play the card that did so #b%d additional time.
The first time each turn you break #yDance, play the card that did so #b%d additional times.

${ModID}:IntroPower.NAME: Intro
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have no Attacks or Skills in hand, draw #b%d card of each missing type.
At the start of your turn, if you have no Attacks or Skills in hand, draw #b%d cards of each missing type.
